title: Home Insurance Solved™ with Budget Direct
description: Compare before you buy and choose the home insurance that’s right for you. Not all benefits apply to all levels of cover.

features.title: Tailor-made cover
features.description: Save by restricting your policy to drivers over a certain age: 21+, 25+, 30+, 40+, 50+ - the biggest age range of any major insurer.

features.title: Lifetime guarantee
features.description: A lifetime guarantee on authorized repairs for as long as you own the car.

features.title: New car replacement
features.description: If you brand-new car is written off within two years or 40.000km of the original registration (whichever comes first), we’ll replace it with a new one (Gold Comprehensive).

features.title: 24/7 claims
features.description: You can lodge a claim over the phone or online at any time of the day or night, 365 days a year.

features.title: Outstanding value
features.description: Winner of Canstar’s Outstanding Value Car Insurance award for a record 14 years in a row (2007 to 2020).

features.title: Highly rated claims
features.description: A 4.2 out of 5 stars claims service, based on nearly 5.000 customer reviews collected by Baazarvoice, a leading independent ratings provider.

features.title: Towing costs
features.description: If you car is involved in an accident and can’t be safely driven, we will pay the reasonable cost of towing your car.

features.title: Hire car following a no fault accident or theft.
features.description: If we agree to pay your claim for a no fault accident or theft of your car, you’ll be eligible for a hire car.
